title: Don't Be A Menace (A Paris Barclay Film)
description:
==========================================================================================================================================================================


"Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking your Juice in the Hood" is a parody of a lot of Afro-American movies, for instance "Boyz N the Hood", "South Central", "Menace II Society", "Higher Learning" and "Juice".

We follow Ashtray as he returns to the place he grew up in and meet his father and his basket-case friends. A lot of crazy stuff happens, for example, Ashtray is older than his father and his best friend Loc Dog's grandmother is a trigger-happy old lady who blames her eccentric-looking kid for not being tough enough.


==========================================================================================================================================================================


Directed By: Paris Barclay

MPAA: Rated " R " For Strong Language, Sexuality, Some Drug Content And Violence.

Runtime: 1 Hour, 30 Minutes, 17 Seconds

Genre: Comedy / Crime

Plot Keywords: Friends / Gun / Family Relationships / Long Title / Uzi

Country: USA

Language: English

Color: Color

Resolution: 608 x 336

Format: Original Widescreen Presentation ( Aspect Ratio: 1.85:1 )
